newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: RTRS-Duketon applies for Argentine gold prospect.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Duketon applies for Argentine gold prospect.

text.p: Argentina's province of La Rioja received a joint offer from Australia's Duketon Goldfields NL and Canada's Yukon Revenue Mines in an exploration tender for the Sierras de las Minas y Ulapes gold prospect, an official said Tuesday.

La Rioja has 60 days to evaluate the offer under the terms of the tender, but a response is likely by the end of next week, the northwestern province's mining director Juan Carlos Sacco told Reuters. The offer was the only bid made in the tender.
Sacco would not comment on a report by the state-owned Telam news agency that the firms had offered to spend US$10 million over three years exploring the prospect.
